name: Monkey Simulator 3D
description:
Role play a MONKEY :)

3D REAL SIMULATOR - You need to maintain your health, hunger, and energy to survive and protect yourself in the forest!

EPIC BATTLES - Run after, howl, and race to catch prey such wild bears, wolves, foxes, and rabbits! Fight off your enemies who do not want you to survive in this dangerous forest!

CREATE A MONKEY PACK - Create, unlock, and raise a pack of monkey to help you hunt and gather food, keep your strength up, and win battles against your enemies.

BE A REAL-LIFE MONKEY - Gain experience points by trying to survive in this forest by searching for food, defeating your enemies, and attacking your prey!

GAIN A MONKEY PERSPECTIVE - Easy controls so you can live your life as a monkey! Zoom in and out to accomplish your monkey missions! Hunt prey to gain energy and experience points!

This game features:
NEW CRAFT MISSIONS
3D REAL SIMULATOR
EPIC BATTLES
MONKEY PACKS
HUNTING WILD BEARS, WOLVES, FOXES, and RABBITS
COLLECTING DIFFERENT COLORED GEMS FOR ENERGY POINTS
AWESOME HIGH-DEFINITION GRAPHICS
ESCAPING FROM WILD PREDATORS OUT TO DESTROY YOU
STRUGGLING TO SURVIVE IN AN UNKNOWN FOREST
3D WORLD TO DISCOVER AND EXPLORE

Role play a REAL LIVE MONKEY!

Like us on Doodle Club!

Follow us on Chroma Club!

Music by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
